synopsis.text: Group ed under the banner of the Marui Group retail store, this anime presents a series of commercials that offer a glimpse into the daily life of Mari Hirakura, a dedicated designer for a cosmetics company. Now in her 30s, Mari has been a part of the workforce for nearly a decade, navigating the complexities of adult life alongside her friends. They engage in conversations about a myriad of topics, from careers and marriage to age and family, each with their own unique perspectives and challenges. Despite her daily efforts and accomplishments, Mari often finds herself contemplating her own self-worth and personal growth. Join her as she journeys through the highs and lows of adulthood, celebrating the intricacies of grown-up life one day at a time. Special feature: Digest-hen (ダイジェスト編).
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
